name: Akuya
description: Have you played enough serious games? Do you want to relax and have some fun with your friends? Well, maybe you can laugh on your own, it is only your decision.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or higher; ATI Radeon HD 4890 or higher
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or higher
